Class BasicAuthIntercept

java.lang.Object
io.avaje.http.client.BasicAuthIntercept
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestIntercept
public class BasicAuthIntercept
extends Object
implements RequestIntercept
Adds Basic Authorization header to requests.
